artist: Designer: Ralph Rapson; Maker: Jonathan Leck

Exhibition catalogue
Hession, Jane King, Rapson, Rip, and Wright, Bruce N.  "Ralph Rapson: Sixty Years of Modern Design." Afton Historical Society Press, Afton, Minnesota, 1999.
creditline: Gift of funds from Christopher Monkhouse, Jennifer Komar Olivarez and Enrique Olivarez, Jr.
description: Upholstered with black fabric; reproduced from a design by Ralph Rapson; first in a series of three that were produced to this design in 1999, and each was slightly modified.
title: Rocker
